headline: Devon Energy Bets on Scale With Coterra Acquisition
summary: Devon Energy announced an all-stock merger with Coterra, creating a $58B shale giant. Here’s what the deal means for DVN stock, dividends, and investors

raw.headline: Devon Energy Bets on Scale With Coterra Acquisition

headline: Devon Coterra Merger Bets On Scale Dividend Growth And Buybacks
summary: Devon Energy (NYSE:DVN) announced an all stock merger with Coterra Energy to form a combined company valued at about $58b. The deal includes a proposed 31% increase in Devon's quarterly dividend for shareholders. Devon also outlined a new share repurchase program of more than $5b as part of the merger plan. Devon Energy focuses on shale production, and combining with Coterra brings together complementary assets across key U.S. basins. For investors, this move comes at a time when large...

headline: Is Coterra Energy Inc. (CTRA) One of the High-Growth, Low P/E Stocks to Buy Now?
summary: Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE:CTRA) is one of the high-growth, low P/E stocks to buy now. On February 6, Wolfe Research touted Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE:CTRA) as one of its top oil-sector picks, poised to benefit from heightened merger and acquisition activity. headline: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for consistent income
summary: Three dividend-paying stocks that are highlighted by Wall Street’s top pros, as tracked by TipRanks, which ranks analysts based on their past performance.
